question:
Which of the following statements are correct?
(a) Lord CornwallisÂ  introduced the system of Subsidiary Alliance.
(b) Lord Dalhousie is introduced the Permanent Settlement of Bengal.
(c) Lord Lytton is associated with Doctrine of Lapse.
(d) Lord Curzon is associated with the Partition of Bengal.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Subsidiary Alliance was introduced by Lord Wellesley. Permanent Settlement was introduced by Lord Cornwallis. The Doctrine of Lapse was introduced by Lord Lytton. Lord Curzon is associated with the Partition of Bengal.
